item.title: Quotes about progress
item.description:
As I am working on our district's 1:1 plan, I have come across several quotes about progress that I liked (in no particular order):

"If There Is No Struggle, There Is No Progress" -- Frederick Douglass

"Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
